shape_2_per_frame1=sounds=(bass+treb+mid)/3;
shape_2_per_frame2=att=(bass_att+treb_att+mid_att)/3;
shape_2_per_frame3=att=(bass_att+treb_att+mid_att)/3;
shape_2_per_frame4=r2=r2+(0.25*sin(time*6.28))-bass;
shape_2_per_frame5=g2=g2+(0.25*sin(time*6.28))-bass;
shape_2_per_frame6=
shape_2_per_frame7=rad=rad;
shape_2_per_frame8=x=x+0.217*cos(time*2.3)+sounds*0.1;
shape_2_per_frame9=y=y+0.217*sin((time*3.5)+(sounds*0.3));
shapecode_3_enabled=0
shapecode_3_sides=4
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1

shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000

shapecode_3_border_g=1.000

shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=dx=0;
per_frame_2=warp=0;
per_frame_3=rot=sin(time*3.14*20)*0.002;
per_frame_4=monitor=bass;
per_frame_5=q3=int(rand(1000))/1000;
per_frame_6=q2=q3+int(rand(1000))/4000;
per_frame_7=all=(bass_att+treb_att+mid_att)/20+all;
per_frame_8=wave_r=q3*0.1+sin(all*0.6)*0.9;
per_frame_9=wave_g=sin(4*sin(all*1.0));
per_frame_10=wave_b=sin(cos(all*1.11)*4);
per_pixel_1=dy=cos(time*555)*above(bass_att,1)*above(y,q3)*below(y,q2);
per_pixel_2=dx=cos(time*555)*above(treb,1)*above(x,q3)*below(x,q2);
per_pixel_3=zoom=above(x,q3)*above(y,q3)*below(x,q2)*below(y,q2)*0.2+1;
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`
warp_6=`    // feather pen
warp_7=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*(1-8*length(texsize.zw)) + 0.5 ).xyz);
warp_8=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*(1+8*length(texsize.zw)) + 0.5 ).xyz);
warp_9=`
warp_10=`    // darken over time
warp_11=`    ret -= 0.03;
warp_12=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`    float2 uv_echo = (uv - 0.5)*1.000*float2(-1,-1) + 0.5;
comp_5=`    ret = lerp( tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz, 
comp_6=`                tex2D(sampler_main, uv_echo).xyz, 
comp_7=`                0.50 
comp_8=`              ); //video echo
comp_9=`    ret *= 2.00; //gamma
comp_10=`    float3 retish = 1 - ret*(1-ret)*4; //solarize
comp_11=`    ret = float3(retish[0]*0.5,retish[1]*0.5,retish[2]);
comp_12=`    ret = pow(ret,1.2-ret);
comp_13=`}
